reviews.text: The Super 8 in Moscow isn't as bad as some reviews make it out to be. It's extremely basic - simple furniture, a small desk, a TV stand with a few drawers, and a glider chair. Furniture seemed new. Bed was ok, though pillows were quite thin.
reviews.title: Simple, Very Basic

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Shower area was very basic and showing its age. I don't think it was dirty... just old. Shower head was extremely low.
reviews.title: Horrible!
Great Place to stay!!
reviews.text: The staff were very friendly. Continental breakfast in the morning offered a few options for cereal, muffins, toast, and apples. Coffe and juice were also offered. Basic, but also included in the room.

reviews.title: Changed my mind
reviews.text: There are many restaurants nearby - McDonalds, Wingers and some others right near the mall area.
